function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited production capacity of PPE (facemasks)","Impact":"Shortage of essential protective equipment","Mitigation":"Increase production capacity through technological innovation and policy changes","Technologies":"Automation, 3D printing, open source design","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Impact of recession on R&D","Impact":"Cancellation of long and medium-term R&D projects","Mitigation":"Strategic planning, diversification of funding sources, government incentives for R&D","Technologies":"Research management software, project evaluation tools","People":"R&D departments, companies, government","Owner":"Companies, government"},{"Description":"Patenting of medical equipment leading to scarcity","Impact":"Limited access to critical medical equipment","Mitigation":"Open source initiatives, policy changes on patenting, collaborative research and development","Technologies":"3D printing, open source design, legal frameworks","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, research institutions"}]}
